mapper.insert: insert into product (product_idx, product_name, product_price, product_count, product_option, brand_idx, div3_idx) VALUES (#{product_idx}, #{product_name}, #{product_price}, #{product_count}, #{product_option}, #{brand_idx}, #{div3_idx})
mapper.update: update product set product_count=#{product_count} where product_idx =#{product_idx}
mapper.select: SELECT p.product_idx, p.product_name, p.product_price, p.product_count, p.product_option, p.div3_idx, b.brand_idx, b.brand_name FROM product p INNER JOIN brand b ON p.brand_idx = b.brand_idx WHERE product_idx = #{product_idx};
